p: Our study aimed to investigate the antibacterial activities of Jatropha latex against MDR bacteria. In this study, we used three species of Jatropha plants to measure the antibacterial activities against MDR bacteria such as methicillin-resistant Staphylococcus aureus (MRSA), extended-spectrum beta-lactamase (ESBL)-producing Escherichia coli, ESBL-producing Klebsiella pneumonia, carbapenemase-resistant Enterobacteriaceae (CRE)- E. coli, K. pneumoniae-carbapenemase (KPC), and carbapenemase-resistant Pseudomonas aeruginosa (CRPA). Three types of latex used in this study were Jatropha curcas, Jatropha gossypilofia Linn., and Jatropha multifida.
